data.title: Duality of knowledge, singularity of method: The case of econophysics and J.S. Mill’s notion of emergence
data.meta_description: Duality of knowledge, singularity of method: The case of econophysics and J.S. Mill’s notion of emergence - Author: Christophe Schinckus, Cinla Akdere
